page.title: 16FOCUS YOUTH CLUB
page.content: We talked to some children and asked them some questions about the{Focus. Most people thought it was good.Here are some details about the{Focus.}The {Focus Youth Club}is on Chestnut Avenue.There is a Monday club,a Thursday club and on Wednesdays they have discos.It is 30 pence membership and 20 pence addmission.It has a snooker table,pool table,table tennis, T.V.room,space invader machines,sweet counter and a big hall.The activities you can play in the hall are badmington,netball,football and hockey.We asked 13 boys and 7 girls what they like best. The girls prefered to play hockey and the boys prefered to play football.At weekends they have football matches and go camping.{Focus}is mainly shut on school holidays.At the Focus they have 1 full time leader and 6 part time.
